location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Examination of tickets on the Khalifa' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:105 x 145 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘33’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This photograph shows passengers on board the vessel Khalifa. In the foreground figures huddle under their robes while in the background at left men examine tickets.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Examination of tickets on the Khalifa'
